pr_title: Ensure @JsonProperty value on Panache Entity is honored

timeline.message:
Ensure @JsonProperty value on Panache Entity is honored

Fixes: #11505

Ensure @JsonProperty value on Panache Entity is honored

Fixes: #11505

timeline.bodyText: Is there a reason why we don't have the same mechanism for @JsonbProperty?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText:
Good question.
The reason is that these @JsonProperty shenanigans are only needed because of the @XmlTransient shenanigans - which Jsonb doesn't seem to care about at all.
replies.author: geoand
